lines: An ex-lover sends you a dozen roses in the mail. With it is a note: "I was just thinking about you and remembered the time we made love outside by the lake. I never really thanked you for it. You were the best. Too bad we couldn't work
everything out; we might have made a swell team -- Much Love"
A note arrives in the mail from an ex-girlfriend. She's been thinking about you lately and just wanted to say "Hi!" Unfortunately, that's all she wants to say.
Please monitor your social behavior a bit more carefully. At this rate you may never find a relationship partner with whom to go through life successfully.
